feed.title: Formbricks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Trust server in the iOS webview to allow to load the survey package by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5024
  • docs: add prometheus to monitoring docs by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5042
  • chore(actions): Update github actions to follow new release pattern by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5037
  • fix: refactored the code to create a new link on click for single-use link surveys by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5038
  • fix: adds missing storage api docs and fixes api key auth docs by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5031
  • fix: add membership checks in remaining routes by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5026
  • chore: added new script with onload by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4987
  • fix: invite user bug by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5043
  • chore: Refactored the Posthog next public env variable and added test files by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4961
  • docs: add EE feature to list by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5051
  • fix: tweak password reset ux by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5049
  • fix: Github release action unable to access secrets by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5052

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.6.0...v3.6.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: use github bug report form instead of formbricks form by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5055
  • fix: Remove hardcoded pg url by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4878
  • fix: storage api endpoint openapi spec by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5057
  • docs: update license page by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5061
  • feat: Added Webhooks in Management API V2 by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4949
  • fix: adds unit tests for tsx files by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5001
  • fix: updated ttl property on cache-handler by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5065
  • chore(deps-dev): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 2 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5062
  • fix: survey id in summary by @jakobsitory in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5056
  • fix: adds network checks for the react-native sdk by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5034
  • fix: static ttf in link survey preview by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5054
  • docs: update hidden field docs by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5067
  • chore: fix OneLeet compliance and update self-hosting docs by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5045
  • chore: updates enable PR comments for terraform plan by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5073
  • fix: docker image not building by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5069
  • fix: github issues url required login by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5077

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.6.1...v3.6.2

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: next-auth inactive session timeout changed 30days -> 1hr by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5066
  • fix: billing modal translation by @jakobsitory in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5079
  • fix: rds by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5078
  • fix: unify alert component by @jakobsitory in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5002
  • chore: Refactored the Sentry next public env variable and added test files by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4979
  • chore: add dependabot config by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5084
  • feat: added the roles endpoint, documentation, unity and e2e tests by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5068
  • chore(eks): add AmazonSSMManagedInstanceCore policy by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5152
  • chore: remove unused cron github actions by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5151
  • feat: adds second domain by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4989
  • chore(deps): bump react-day-picker from 9.4.4 to 9.6.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5149
  • feat: api for uploading contacts in bulk by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5053

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.6.2...v3.6.3

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: fix response client api endpoint is missing environmentId by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5161
  • chore(infra): increase ressource limits to 1 cpu & 1Gi mem by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5192
  • fix: adding back hidden fields for backwards compatibility by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5163
  • chore: remove posthog provider from top layout by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5169
  • chore: changes storage cache to 5 minutes by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5196
  • chore: remove unused tailwind import from mobile SDK webviews by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5198
  • chore: update storybook app dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5195
  • fix: consent/cta back button issue by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5201
  • fix: added cache no-store when formbricksDebug is enabled by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5197
  • fix: (Security) implement HSTS by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5206
  • chore: update demo app dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5207
  • fix: bulk member invite and table layout by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5209
  • chore: update SHARE_RATE_LIMIT to 50 request per 5 minute by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5194
  • fix: skip button label validation for required nps and rating questions by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5153

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.7.0...v3.7.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.0
entry.content:
This release extends the Management API to support user and team management. It also moves API key management from the project level to the organization level. To manage API keys, a Manager or Owner role is now required.

The data migration that moves existing API keys to the new location runs automatically when Formbricks is updated.

What's Changed

  • feat: lastLoginAt to user model by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5216
  • feat: organization endpoints by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5076
  • feat: user endpoints by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5232
  • chore(deps): bump SonarSource/sonarqube-scan-action from 4.2.1 to 5.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5104
  • chore: Api keys to org level by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5044
  • chore: added isActive to user model by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5211
  • chore: block signin with SSO when user is not found by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5233
  • chore: update root npm dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5208
  • chore: update vite & vitest dependency versions by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5217
  • fix: don't allow spaces as "other" values in select questions by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5224
  • fix: failing e2e test by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5234
  • fix: upgrade npm dependencies with high security risk by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.7.1...v3.8.0
